name: Olaya's Tale
description:
Olaya is a seventeen-year-old teenager who one day discovers an old and abandoned book of magic on a dusty bookshelf in her grandparents' attic. This strange book absorbs her in a portal to the past, specifically to Paris in 1789, in the middle of the French Revolution, but on the way the book loses two pages. These are scattered by a series of emblematic locations of the Parisian city, such as the Cathedral of Notre Dame. The aim of Olaya is to recover the pages in order to return to her time.

System requirements
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 300MB available space
Contols
  • The LEFT arrow to move to the left
  • The RIGHT arrow to move to the right
  • SPACE to jump
  • CTRL to hide behind the marked objects (the mirror and the vase)
  • ESC to pause the game
